name: 27th International Conference on Immunology and Infectious Disease
content: Immunology Conferences | Top Immunology conferences 2022 | Global Immunology Conferences | Immunologists and Immunology conferences | Europe | USA | Asia Immunology Conference 2022 welcomes all of you to join the 27th International Conference on Immunology and Infectious Disease which will be held in Dublin, Ireland on 22-23 September 2022\. Under the theme "The Role of the Immune System against Infectious Diseases and Viral Pandemics", this conference is your best opportunity to arrive at the biggest array of members from the Immunology community. Widely acclaimed speakers, the latest strategies, advancements, and the most up to date refreshes in Immunology are signs of this gathering. Through the oral and poster displays, scientific sessions, and networking sessions, we tend to encourage dialogue between all the attendees to fill within the gaps to inspire innovative collaborations. Download our brochure: https://immunologyconference.euroscicon.com/conference-brochure Benefits for you at the event: 1\. Keynote certificate / speaker Certificate 2\. CPD certificate / CME certificate 3\. Best speaker / best young researcher award 4\. Journal Publication with ISSN number 5\. Separate Biography and research page in website. 6\. Conference Kit 7\. Lunch and breakfast.
